items.sentence: Tom certainly gives the impression that he doesn\'t know what he\'s doing.
Tom used to pick on Mary all the time when they were in elementary school.
Tom vowed to do everything within his power to protect the local wildlife.
Tom waited for the applause to die down before he announced the next song.
The most important thing in the Olympics is not to win but to participate.
The new station building is under construction and will be completed soon.
The time women spend doing housework is now a lot less than it used to be.
It\'ll be easier to do that yourself than to try to convince Tom to do it.
Tom\'s parents died in an automobile accident when he was three years old.
Nobody knew it was Tom who donated three million dollars to the orphanage.
